department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
short_summary: Replacement of existing water storage tanks for the Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia
description: The Embassy of Canada to Saudi Arabia   located in  Riyad, Saudi Arabia,   requires the  existing water storage tanks to be replaced...ΓThis requirement is part of a 7-unit staff quarter  construction project. The existing water storage tanks are a fibreglass lined plastic tanks  housed within a concrete structure.
